name: Whoami Execution Anomaly
description: Detects the execution of whoami with suspicious parents or parameters
false_positives: Scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
query: (((((process.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Hh][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.original_file_name:/[Ww][Hh][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:(/.*\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]_[Ii][Ss][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ [Aa][Gg][Ee][Nn][Tt]\\[Aa][Gg][Ee][Nn][Tt]\\[Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR "")))) AND (NOT (NOT _exists_:process.parent.executable))) OR process.command_line:(/.*[Ww][Hh][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii]\ \-[Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Hh][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii]\ \/[Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Hh][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ \-[Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Hh][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ \/[Aa][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Hh][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ \>.*/ OR /.*[Ww][Hh][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii]\ \>.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(((((process.executable:*\\whoami.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:whoami.exe) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\powershell_ise.exe)))) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\Microsoft\ Monitoring\ Agent\\Agent\\MonitoringHost.exe OR "")))) AND (NOT (NOT _exists_:process.parent.executable))) OR process.command_line:(*whoami\ \-all* OR *whoami\ \/all* OR *whoami.exe\ \-all* OR *whoami.exe\ \/all* OR *whoami.exe\ >* OR *whoami\ >*))`
